00056 CSearchDialog::CSearchDialog( ListCSwordModuleInfo& modules, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00057     : KDialogBase(Tabbed, i18n("Search Dialog"), Close | User1 | User2, User1, parent, name,    false, true, i18n("Search"), i18n("Interrupt"), QString::null)
00058 {
00059     setIcon(MODULE_SEARCH_ICON_SMALL);
00060     m_searcher.connectPercentUpdate(this, SLOT(percentUpdate()));
00061     m_searcher.connectFinished(this, SLOT(searchFinished()));
00062         
00063     initView(); 
00064     readSettings(); 
00065         
00066     setModuleList( modules );
00067     if (modules.count())
00068         showPage(pageIndex(m_searchTextPage));      
00069 }

00071 CSearchDialog::~CSearchDialog(){
00072     saveSettings(); 
00073 }

00081 }

00084 void CSearchDialog::initView() {
00085     enableButton(User2,false);
00086 
00087     m_moduleChooserPage     = addVBoxPage(i18n("Choose modules"), i18n("Choose the modules for the search"));
00088     m_moduleChooser         = new CSearchDialogModuleChooser(m_moduleChooserPage);
00089     connect(m_moduleChooser, SIGNAL(chosenModulesChanged()), SLOT(chosenModulesChanged()));
00090     
00091     m_searchTextPage = addVBoxPage(i18n("Search Text"), i18n("Enter the text to search for"));
00092     m_searchText            = new CSearchDialogText(m_searchTextPage);
00093     m_searchTextPage->setEnabled(false);
00094     
00095     m_searchResultPage = addHBoxPage(i18n("Search Result"), i18n("The result of your search"));
00096     m_searchResult = new CSearchDialogResult(m_searchResultPage);
00097     m_searchResultPage->setEnabled(false);
00098     
00099     m_searchAnalysisPage = addVBoxPage(i18n("Search Analysis"), i18n("Graphical analysis of your search result"));  
00100     m_searchAnalysis = new CSearchDialogAnalysis(m_searchAnalysisPage);
00101     m_searchAnalysisView =  new CSearchDialogAnalysisView(m_searchAnalysis, m_searchAnalysisPage);
00102     m_searchAnalysisPage->setEnabled(false);
00103 
00104     m_searchAnalysisSaveButton = new QPushButton("Save Analysis to Disk", m_searchAnalysisPage);
00105 
00106     connect(m_searchAnalysisSaveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00107         this, SLOT(slotSaveSearchAnalysis()));  
00108 }

00110 ListCSwordModuleInfo& CSearchDialog::getModuleList() {
00111 //  ASSERT(moduleList);
00112     m_moduleList = m_moduleChooser->getChosenModules();
00113     return m_moduleList;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void CSearchDialog::setModuleList(ListCSwordModuleInfo& list) {
00117 //#warning change for gcc3
00118 //  if (&m_moduleList != &list)
00119     if (m_moduleList != list)
00120         m_moduleList = list; //copy the items of "list"
00121     
00122     m_moduleChooser->blockSignals(true);
00123     m_moduleChooser->setChosenModules(m_moduleList);
00124     m_moduleChooser->blockSignals(false);   
00125     
00126     m_searchTextPage->setEnabled(m_moduleList.count()>0);   
00127     m_searchResult->clearResult();
00128     m_searchAnalysis->reset();
00129 }

00131 void CSearchDialog::slotSaveSearchAnalysis(){
00132     const QString file = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName(QString::null, QString::fromLatin1("*.html | %1").arg(i18n("HTML files")), 0, i18n("Save Search Analysis"));
00133     if (!file.isNull()) {
00134         int moduleIndex = 0;
00135         int count = 0;
00136         QString countStr = "";
00137         QString m_searchAnalysisHTML = "";
00138         QString tableTitle = "";
00139       QString tableTotals = "";
00140         QString VerseRange = "";
00141         const QString txtCSS = QString::fromLatin1("<style type='text/css'>\nTD {border: thin solid black;}\nTH {font-size: 130%;text-align: left;vertical-align:top;}\n</style>\n");   
00142         CSwordVerseKey key(0);
00143         ListKey searchResult;
00144         
00145         key.key("Genesis 1:1");
00146     
00147         if (m_searchText->scopeChooser->getScopeType() != CSwordModuleSearch::Scope_NoScope) {
00148             ListKey verses = m_searcher.scope();
00149             for (int i = 0; i < verses.Count(); ++i) {
00150                 VerseKey* element = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(verses.GetElement(i));
00151                 if (element) {
00152                     VerseRange += QString("%1 - %2").arg(QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)element->LowerBound())).arg(QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)element->UpperBound())) + "<br>";
00153                 }
00154             }
00155         }
00156 
00157         QDict<CSearchDialogAnalysisItem>* m_searchAnalysisItems = m_searchAnalysis->getSearchAnalysisItemList();
00158         CSearchDialogAnalysisItem* analysisItem = m_searchAnalysisItems->find( key.book() );
00159         
00160     QString text = "<html>\n<head>\n<title>" + i18n("BibleTime Search Analysis") + "</title>\n" + txtCSS + "</head>\n<body>\n";
00161         text += "<table>\n<tr><th>" + i18n("Search Text :") + "</th><th>" + m_searchText->getText() + "</th></tr>\n";
00162         text += "<tr><th>" + i18n("Search Type :") + "</th><th>" + m_searchText->getSearchTypeString() + "</th></tr>\n";
00163         text += "<tr><th>" + i18n("Search Scope:") + "</th><th>" + ((m_searchText->scopeChooser->getScopeType() != CSwordModuleSearch::Scope_NoScope) ? VerseRange : m_searchText->scopeChooser->getScopeTypeString()) + "</th></tr>\n</table>\n<br>\n";
00164 
00165 
00166       tableTitle = "<tr><th align=\"left\">" + i18n("Book") + "</th>";
00167         tableTotals = "<tr><td align=\"left\">" + i18n("Total Hits") + "</td>";
00168         for (moduleIndex = 0,m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current(); m_moduleList.next(),++moduleIndex) {
00169                 tableTitle += QString::fromLatin1("<th align=\"left\">") + m_moduleList.current()->name() + QString::fromLatin1("</th>");
00170                 searchResult = m_moduleList.current()->searchResult();
00171                 countStr.setNum(searchResult.Count());
00172           tableTotals += QString::fromLatin1("<td align=\"right\">") + countStr + QString::fromLatin1("</td>");
00173         }
00174         tableTitle += QString::fromLatin1("</tr>\n");
00175         tableTotals += QString::fromLatin1("</tr>\n");
00176 
00177         m_searchAnalysisHTML = "";
00178         bool ok = true;     
00179         while (ok) {
00180             m_searchAnalysisHTML += QString::fromLatin1("<tr><td>") + key.book() + QString::fromLatin1("</td>");
00181             analysisItem = m_searchAnalysisItems->find( key.book() );
00182             for (moduleIndex = 0,m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current(); m_moduleList.next(), ++moduleIndex) {
00183                 count = analysisItem->getCountForModule(moduleIndex);
00184                 countStr.setNum(count);
00185                 m_searchAnalysisHTML += QString::fromLatin1("<td align=\"right\">") + countStr + QString::fromLatin1("</td>");
00186             }
00187             m_searchAnalysisHTML += QString::fromLatin1("</tr>\n");
00188             ok = key.next(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook);
00189         }
00190         text += QString::fromLatin1("<table>\n") + tableTitle + tableTotals + m_searchAnalysisHTML + QString::fromLatin1("</table>\n");
00191         text += QString::fromLatin1("<center>") + i18n("Created by") + QString::fromLatin1(" <a href=\"http://www.bibletime.de/\">BibleTime</a></center>");
00192         text += QString::fromLatin1("</body></html>");
00193         CToolClass::savePlainFile(file, text);
00194     }
00195 }

00197 void CSearchDialog::slotUser1() {
00198     startSearch();
00199 }
00200 
00201 void CSearchDialog::slotUser2() {
00202 //  if (searcher->isSearching())
00203     m_searcher.interruptSearch();
00204 }
00205 
00206 void CSearchDialog::startSearch(void) {
00207     int searchFlags = m_searchText->getSearchType();    
00208     // set the parameters
00209     m_searchText->updateCurrentProgress(0);
00210     m_searchText->updateOverallProgress(0);
00211     m_searchText->setText( m_searchText->getText() );
00212         
00213     m_searcher.setModules( getModuleList() );
00214     m_searcher.setSearchedText(m_searchText->getText());
00215 
00216     if (m_searchText->isCaseSensitive())
00217         searchFlags |= CSwordModuleSearch::caseSensitive;
00218     m_searcher.resetSearchScope();
00219     CSwordModuleSearch::scopeType scopeType = m_searchText->scopeChooser->getScopeType();
00220     
00221     if (scopeType == CSwordModuleSearch::Scope_LastSearch) {
00222         searchFlags |= CSwordModuleSearch::useLastResult;
00223     }
00224     else if ( scopeType == CSwordModuleSearch::Scope_Bounds ) {
00225         searchFlags |= CSwordModuleSearch::useScope;    
00226         m_searcher.setSearchScope( m_searchText->scopeChooser->getScope() );
00227     }
00228     m_searcher.setSearchOptions(searchFlags);
00229     enableButton(User1,false);
00230     enableButton(User2,true);
00231     m_searchAnalysis->reset();
00232     m_searchResult->clearResult();
00233         
00234     m_searcher.startSearchThread();
00235 }
00236 
00237 void CSearchDialog::setSearchText(const QString text){
00238   m_searchText->setText(text);
00239     if (!text.isEmpty())
00240         showPage(pageIndex(m_searchTextPage));
00241 }
00242 
00244 const QString CSearchDialog::getSearchedText() const {
00245     return m_searchText->getText();
00246 }
00247 
00249 void CSearchDialog::chosenModulesChanged(){
00250     setModuleList(getModuleList());
00251 }

00254 void CSearchDialog::show(){
00255     KDialogBase::show();
00256 
00257     if ( CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::firstSearchDialog) ){
00258         CHTMLDialog dlg(HELPDIALOG_FIRSTTIME_SEARCH);
00259         dlg.exec();
00260         CBTConfig::set(CBTConfig::firstSearchDialog, false);
00261     }           
00262 }
00263 
00265 void CSearchDialog::searchFinished(){
00266 //  qWarning("CSearchDialog::searchFinished()");
00267     m_searchText->updateCurrentProgress(100);
00268     m_searchText->updateOverallProgress(100);
00269     m_searchAnalysis->reset();
00270     if ( m_searcher.foundItems() ){
00271         m_searchResult->setModuleList(getModuleList());         
00272         m_searchAnalysis->setModuleList(getModuleList());
00273         m_searchAnalysisView->setContentsPos(0,0);
00274         m_searchResultPage->setEnabled(true);
00275         m_searchAnalysisPage->setEnabled(true);                     
00276         showPage(pageIndex(m_searchResultPage));    //the result page
00277                         
00278         m_searchAnalysis->analyse();            
00279     }
00280     else
00281         m_searchResult->clearResult();
00282 
00283     enableButton(User2,false);
00284     enableButton(User1,true);   
00285 }
00286 
00288 void CSearchDialog::percentUpdate(){
00289 //  old_overallProgress = m_searcher.getPercent(CSwordModuleSearch::currentModule);
00290     m_searchText->updateOverallProgress(m_searcher.getPercent(CSwordModuleSearch::allModules));
00291     
00292 //  old_currentProgress = m_searcher.getPercent(CSwordModuleSearch::currentModule);
00293     m_searchText->updateCurrentProgress(m_searcher.getPercent(CSwordModuleSearch::currentModule));
00294     KApplication::kapp->processEvents();
00295 }
